## PriceIdSessionCreateParams interface

Parameters for createing a session with a Stripe price ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PriceIdSessionCreateParams extends CommonSessionCreateParams 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [CommonSessionCreateParams](./firestore-stripe-payments.commonsessioncreateparams.md)

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
